title: Lincoln's WARNING #100034: Market Crash Fears Rise
script: Market Crash Fears Rise? Let me explain the CON: They got you arguing about CRUMBS while they eating the whole CAKE! Left vs Right? That's the SHOW! Real fight is UP vs DOWN, but they keep you fighting LEFT vs RIGHT! WAKE UP! Bitcoin below. Listen up. Market Crash Fears Rise... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
